title: Combo doesn't take focus by clicking on it (Photon)
description: When trying to click on the first Combo, it does not take focus.
OB: Currently, the focus caret does not appear in the first Combo when it is clicked on.
EB: The expected behavior is for the focus caret to appear in the first Combo when it is clicked on.
SR: To reproduce the issue, open the 'Add a new CVS Repository' dialog, and attempt to click on the first Combo. The focus caret should not appear in the first Combo when it is clicked on.
